subject: PHYS
title: Quantum Physics 2
description: Formalism of quantum mechanics. Operator approach to the harmonic oscillator.  Quantum mechanics in three dimensions: Hydrogen atom, angular momentum and spin. Time-independent perturbation theory. Fine structure of hydrogen. Zeeman effect. Identical particles. The variational principle. Ground state of the helium atom. Applications in atomic and molecular physics. [Offered: W]
